We experimented with feeding the shortest output from the
Blog text back into the algorithm to see if it could continue
shortening.  It  continued  to  produce  cuts  between  70
each  iteration.  We  ceased  after  3  iterations,  having
shortened the text to less than 50% length without sacrifi
ing  readability  or  major  content.  The  user  can  take  adva
tage  of  this  functionality  by  pushing  the  Shortn  button
again once the results come back.
